comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: J.P. Morgan had several vessels named Corsair. At least two were sold to the US Navy. One sold in 1898 was renamed the USS Gloucester. www.history.navy.mil/photos/sh-usn/usnsh-g/gloucest.htm But this is presumably the one built in 1899 and described at www.history.navy.mil/photos/sh-usn/usnsh-c/sp159.htm If you happen to have a spare $105 million you could buy a recent "imitation" at www.luxist.com/2009/09/07/the-classicist-cruise-like-j-p-...
